title: Start
body:
<<namebox_name ???>>
<<tsuki_changeanim>>
<<tsuki_anim hi>>
Hi kids!!!
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Welcome to the first broadcast of this wonderful program.
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
I'm Tsuki and I'll be your host.
<<kids_normal>>
In this program we will have a lot of fun.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
We will do many things that you would like.
We can blow up balloons, we will look for objects, I will tell them stories.
Anyway, a lot of fun things.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
They are ready?
<<kids_yey>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<pause 2>>
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
I love that mood.
<<kids_normal>>
Well let's get started.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<stop_music>>
<<rules>>
<<end>> end

title: activities
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
Well...
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<option_activities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
What activities do you want to do?
<<none>>

title: charla0
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Children know about the existence of primary colors, right?
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
But do you know how they are formed?
<<pause 2>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Do you want me to explain it to you?
<<kids_yey>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<pause 4>>
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Well, I'll explain it to you.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Primary colors are formed by a certain type of light.
<<tsuki_anim happy>> The white light comes from our friend the sun.
That light, when bouncing off other objects, reaches our eyes in different ways.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Upon reaching them, it is separated into different waves that we see as colors.
Primary colors are just one way our brain interprets that light.
So you know how they are formed.
Did you like my explanation?
<<kids_yey>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<pause 4>>
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
I'm glad you learned.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: comercialpause
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
I have bad news, kids.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
But it's time for our first commercial break.
But don't worry...
We'll see you in a few minutes.
<<comercialPause>> 
<<end>> end

title: charla1
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Many are afraid of the dark, right?
<<pause 2>>
Come on, don't be sorry.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
I was afraid of the dark when I was little.
Being afraid of her is normal.
<<tsuki_flip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
But they don't really have to fear him.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Although it is quite uncomfortable to be in the dark.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
Nothing can harm us.
Those monsters that we think are in it are just a figment of our imagination.
As children we tend to misinterpret what is in the dark.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
They don't have to be afraid.
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla2
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Do you children have pets in your homes?
<<pause 4>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Don't you think that having a pet is a very nice thing?
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Having a pet is something that requires a lot of responsibility.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
It's nice to have a little animal that gives us pure love.
I have a dog at my house.
And you?
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: searchobjectsStart
body:

<<kids_happy>>

That seems fine to me.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Let's see if they find them all.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<startSearch>> end

title: story0
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Have you heard the story of the ugly duckling?
<<pause 2>>
No?
Well, let me tell you.
Let me tell you his story.
<<tsuki_flip>>
One day, a goose laid some eggs, but there was one of them that was much bigger than the rest.
In that egg was a duck whose appearance made him look different from his brothers.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
'Ugly' is what they called the duck whose appearance made him look different from the others.
One day the mother goose takes her children to a farm.
But the chickens, pigs and animals that lived there mocked him for his appearance.
'Ugly' they called him, pecked him and laughed.
Even his mother didn't love him.
'Ugly' is what they called the duckling who was not like his brothers, he could only get away from his family.
Without a fixed direction, he just walked away from that place where he was not accepted for his appearance.
On his way, he met a little mouse who became his friend regardless of his appearance.
<<tsuki_flip>>
They chatted and laughed.
The duckling and the mouse became inseparable.
Without caring about his appearance, the little mouse was at his side.
As time went by, 'Ugly' was what they called the duckling that was rejected by others.
It grew and grew.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
But something had changed, that's how he felt.
For some reason the swans on the lakes no longer found it strange.
They didn't even laugh at him.
'Why is that?' he wondered.
One day when he and the mouse were at a lake, the duckling saw his reflection for the first time in a long time.
And he realized something incredible.
She had turned into a beautiful swan.
Excited by this he just cried with joy.
The little mouse knew about her change.
<<tsuki_flip>>
But she simply told him.
'I've never cared what you looked like.'
Well, I think I should leave it here.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Although I didn't tell you the original version, that's the one I know.
He he.
They like me?
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 8>>
<<end>> end

title: story1
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Do you know the story of the tortoise and the hare?
Well, it's the story of how a slow tortoise beat a fast hare.
And it goes like this.
One day, a tortoise and a hare were talking.
During that conversation, the hare at one point said...
<<tsuki_flip>>
[i]'We hares are very fast, I don't think anyone can beat us in a race'[/i]
To this the turtle responded...
[i]'I can beat you in a race.'[/i]
<<tsuki_noflip>>
The hare, upon hearing that, simply laughed.
[i]'Hahaha, a slow turtle like you wouldn't be able to beat me'[/i]
The turtle, so calm, simply responded.
[i]'I challenge you to a race.'[/i]
[i]'Let's see who is faster.'[/i]
The hare confidently accepted, because according to her a tortoise would not be able to beat him.
<<tsuki_flip>>
The challenge is...
'Whoever reaches the tree 15 minutes from here first wins'
Said the hare.Â­
Then, the challenge began.
On your marks, ready and out...
<<tsuki_noflip>>
The hare took off, while the tortoise started at a slow pace.
Running and running, the hare got so far away that he lost sight of the tortoise.
'It is assured that I will be the winner'
Said the hare.
So confident, she decided to take a nap.
<<tsuki_flip>>
The tortoise came to where the hare was sleeping.
And he continued on his way.
Upon waking up, the confident hare continued on his way to the tree.
But when he arrived he realized that the turtle had beaten him.
A tortoise showed that he could beat a hare.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
Although I didn't tell you the original version, it's more or less the same.
I hope you liked it.
//<<play_music_a>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 8>>
<<end>> end

title: storySelect
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
What story do you want to hear?
<<none>>

title: charla3
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
The beaches are undoubtedly truly incredible places.
It helps us cool down and even more so on these hot days.
Although many do not simply go to the beach to cool off.
<<tsuki_flip>>
Many go just to admire its beauty.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
Beaches are one of the most beautiful places on earth.
<<tsuki_flip>>
But I think that we humans have damaged the planet too much and the beaches are greatly affected by our pollution.
So we must do our part to take care of our fragile ecosystem.
I hope many of you want to take care of our only home.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
Our beautiful land.
Do you want your home?
<<pause 4>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Well said.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla4
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Without a doubt, eating sweets is something that many of us like to do.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Even I like to eat a lot of sweets.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<tsuki_flip>>
While they are really delicious.
Eating them in excess is not good.
We can suffer from cavities if we do not brush our teeth 3 times a day.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
So remember to brush your teeth very well and don't eat too much sweets.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla5
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Children, are you afraid of ghosts?
<<pause 2>>
Well, I think it's something that even scares me a lot.
<<tsuki_flip>>
Although, many say that they do not exist.
It would be a very scary thing to find one.
They do not believe?
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla6
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Many of us play video games.
Even I play video games.
<<tsuki_flip>>
Although they are fun, obsessing over them is not okay.
We can play for several hours.
But I think we should see them as something that helps many of us learn.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
They immerse us in that fantastic world, they help us feed our imagination.
I think seeing video games as something bad is not right.
But it is not good to obsess over them either.
OK?
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
It's good that you understand it.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla7
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Playing in the rain is fun.
And even more so if you do it with your friends.
Bathing in the rain is just fun.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<tsuki_flip>>
Even me, at my age, sometimes I bathe in the rain.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
The bad thing is that many of us end up catching a cold.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
But I think fun has its price.
He he.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla8
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Many of us have favorite toys.
They can be toy cars, dolls or another type of toy.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<tsuki_flip>>
As I remember I had a doll that was my favorite toy.
When I was little I went with her everywhere.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
What is your favorite toy?
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla9
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>

Draw, do you like to draw?
<<kids_yey>>

<<tsuki_anim idle>>

<<tsuki_anim happy>>
It is one of the things that I am most passionate about.
How much do you like to draw?
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>

title: resumeShow
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<tsuki_changeanim>>
<<tsuki_anim hi>>
Hello again kids!!
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
Welcome again.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Let's keep having fun.
OK?
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
I love his encouragement.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<summarize>>
<<end>> end

title: showEnd
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Kids, I have bad news.
But we're running out of time and we have to leave the show here.
<<pause 2>>
<<tsuki_flip>>
But don't worry, we'll see you tomorrow for more fun.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
So, with a loud shout of joy we must say goodbye.
No?
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
That's how I like it.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Well...
<<tsuki_anim hi>>
See you soon.
<<showEnd>>
<<end>> end
